reviewText: Product got here fast. I have been wanting to try thi chi for the longest and look forward to learning more.

The DVD, in general, is good, though I had issues with some aspects. The instruction is good for experienced Tai Chi practitioners, but not for the beginners. Angela didn't provide the names of the movements, and some of the movements were mixed. She presented some movements in the instruction and others in the routine. In addition, the movie was filmed in the corner of a room, which confuses the angles of the turns.
